title: "Fraunhofer IPMS, CAST Reveal 32-Bit RISC-V Processor with Edge AI, TinyML Enhancements"
excerpt: "Launched earlier this year, the CAST EMSA5-FS is a 32-bit single-issue in-order RISC-V processor designed for energy efficiency in embedded and microcontroller scenarios. Already shipping, it's well-suited for a variety of tasks â€” but Fraunhofer IPMS found that it could be easily improved for tinyML and edge AI work with a couple of key tweaks."
